error_nonPositiveNum.message: finauga e mafai ona na o > 0

error_invalidConfigFile.message: Config faila e tatau ona auina atu i fafo se mea

error_failedToLoadConfigFile.message: Le mafai ona utaina faila config

error_templateNotFound.message: O se faila faataitai e le o maua i

warn_configFileExists.message: Config faila ua uma ona i ai

error_firstArgNotExist.message: O le finauga muamua e mafai ona na o se faila po o se faatonuga o loo i ai nei

error_doesNotExist.message: e leai se mea e fai

info_scssFilesToBeCompiled.message: SCSS faila e tatau ona aoina

info_noSCSSfilesWillBeCompiled.message: E leai se faila SCSS o le a aoina

tip_editToSetDefaults.message: Faasaʻo lenei faila e customize defaults

tip_cliArgsPrioritized.message: O finauga a le CLI e sili atu i nei tulaga faatauaina i taimi uma

inputPathDesc_main.message: Ala i le SCSS faila po o le faatonuga o loo i ai faila SCSS e tatau ona tuufaatasia

inputPathDesc_extra.message: faatusatusa i le Faatonu o Galuega i le taimi nei

outputPathDesc_main.message: Ala i faila po o faatonuga o le a teuina faila sourcemap CSS +

outputPathDesc_extra.message: e tusa ai ma le sao aʻa (pe afai e le tuuina atu, css/ e faaaoga)

optionDesc_dryRun.message: Aua le aoina le faila(s), na o le faaali atu pe o le a latou faagasolo

optionDesc_dotfolders.message: Faʻaaofia dotfolders i le sailiga faila

optionDesc_noSourceMaps.message: Puipuia faʻafanua puna mai le gaosiaina

optionDesc_noMinify.message: Le mafai minification o galuega faatino CSS

optionDesc_copy.message: Kopi tuufaatasia CSS i clipboard nai lo le tusia e faila pe afai o loo faagasolo se faila puna e tasi

optionDesc_relativeOutput.message: Output faila e faatusatusa i faila puna taitasi nai lo le sao aʻa

optionDesc_quiet.message: Suppress logging uma vagana ai mea sese

optionDesc_ignores.message: Faʻamaumauga/faʻatonuga e faʻateʻaina mai le faʻaputuga

optionDesc_commentMain.message: Saunia le ulutala faʻamatalaga i le CSS faʻaputuputuina

optionDesc_commentExtra.message: Eseese i le laina e faaaoga ai le "\n"

optionDesc_init.message: Fausia config faila (i le galuega faatino root)

optionDesc_version.message: Faaali atu le numera o le lomiga
